name: 25 Days
description:
The world is going to end in 25 days. Daiki and his friends have to get to  Lostlond before the world ends. If they don't get to Lostlond on time they will dissolve along with the world. 

You can't trust anyone. Good, Bad, Neutral. Nobody can be trusted. Everyone is an enemy

Play this RPG with an interesting plot and a large cast of characters. 

✓ Have up to 8 characters in battle at the same

✓ Have up to 8 characters follow you at the same time

✓ Over 300 skills.

✓ Multiple Secret Bosses

✓ Over 5 hours of gameplay

ᵗʰᵘᵐᵇᶰᵃᶦᶫ ᵃʳᵗ ᵐᵃᵈᵉ ʷ/ʳᵖᵍ ᵐᵃᵏᵉʳ ᵐᵛ ᵃʳᵗ
